I think via the debug menu using alt-F12

There are definitely parameters that can be changed in persistent.sfs (eg: pretty much everything in the first page or so of the file is related to difficulty settings.)

Just fire up your favorite text editor, and alter as-needed?

Oooh! So it's in persistent thing. I was looking for it in settings.cfg. That wouldn't make any sense if I found it there, would it?

Heck, you can edit them ingame by, before loading the save, highlighting it (Single-Click) and hitting something along the lines of "Edit Difficulty!"
